_comment: This is a JSON file containing the dialogs. prefixes: Q = multi-choice question, I = information, E = text entry, N = number entry, Test = for testing purposes

QHome.text: Home : Select which information you want to consult

QhasSaveFile.text: Do you wish to load a save file ?

EfileName.text: Enter the name of your save file (without extension, put in the saves/ folder):

NdepositGold.text: How much gold do you want to deposit to your guild's treasury ?

IfileLoadError.text: Error loading save file. Starting a new game.

QRandomStuff.text: Blah Blah adventurer woo show me what you got bitch

QquitGame.text: Do you wish to quit the game ?

QendDemo.text: You have reached the end of this demo. Thank you for playing !

IMerchantIsHere.text: The merchant has arrived ! (1 gold = 1 ration, adventurers consume 1/day)

NBuyFood.text: How much food packs do you want to buy ?
